main event: An airline pilot reported seeing a brilliant white object flying at high speed about 40 miles south of Elko, Nevada on August 20, 1965.
interesting points: The object had a blurred edge similar to an arc welder,The pilot believed the object was moving much faster than their aircraft,The object lasted in sight for about 10 to 15 seconds,The object disappeared suddenly as if the light was turned off,The sighting was reported to Salt Lake City air traffic control.
witness description: airline pilot and a flight engineer
